summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.0°C) and outside temperature (down 5.3°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.3 mm), cloud levels (up 724 m), and light levels (up 9876 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.3 mm), light levels (up 11676 lux), and cloud levels (up 1671 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 723.5m lower than yesterday, 650.3m lower than the past week, 1670.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1000.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1651.0m and 2670m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, air moisture should feel ok. A few light raindrops may fall, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
